notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: C.F. and P.-E.C. reviewed the literature, prepared figures, and wrote the paper. J.Z., G.B.-B., and V.M. helped for figures; V.L., P.J., V.C., G.B.-B., V.M., A.G. provided critical feedback; A.G, V.L., G.B.-B. and V.M. helped shape the manuscript and revised the final version. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
